original_text: For the living know that they will die, but the dead know nothing, and they have no more reward, for the memory of them is forgotten.
korean_text: 산 자들은 죽을 줄을 알되 죽은 자들은 아무것도 모르며 그들이 다시는 상을 받지 못하는 것은 그들의 이름이 잊어버린 바 됨이니라

sentences.original_text: For the living know that they will die
and they have no more reward
for the memory of them is forgotten
